website_summaries.verdict: The brand has gained confidence over the years for offering quality products. However, some competitors offer quicker and more noticeable results.
pros: In addition to controlling yellow and brassy tones, this formula is great at cleaning, moisturizing, and controlling frizz
cons: Somewhat difficult to rinse out of hair
Takes several applications to see results

customer_reviews.title: From Brass to Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This has turned my VERY brassy blonde into a pretty shade and I am very pleased with the product. And it came in good condition. From left to right is: before, after one wash, and after two washes.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, in love!
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine in today, this is my hair after ONE wash, left on for 3 minutes. The first photo is my hair when I first got it done from being a very dark brown, and the second picture is a week later after using this purple wash the first time! I'm in LOVE!!!! I've tried others in the past and never had results like this before!
customer_reviews.author: Cass Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Will Not order from this seller again, unusable
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to give zero stars. I can’t rate a product I cannot use. Shampoo came in a bag. No protection. Top unscrewed, leaked. Big mess. Wanted to use the rest of it. THE PUMP DOESN’T WORK. I cannot even use the remainder of the shampoo. I got robbed. So disappointed. Can’t find any way to get customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M Olk

customer_reviews.title: Does Nothing for Blonde Hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst purple shampoo I’ve ever used. The pump didn’t work and I had to take it out every time I used it- that was just annoying. But more importantly, it had zero effect on brassy blonde. I used this a couple times a week for a couple months before throwing the whole bottle in the trash. Purple shampoos are supposed to help keep your blonde, rid yellow or brassy tones, etc. This did nothing at all. My stylist also told me later on that this shampoo was a total bust. I will not be buying or using again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly Toner for Blondes
customer_reviews.text: This is great at toning brassy shades in blonde hair. I wouldn't say it's as good as the Pravana brand, but it's still great - and a decent price. I actually aim for a lavender tint to my bleached hair, so I like to leave this on for around 10 minutes while I'm in the shower. It gives a nice sparkle to my blonde.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Price

customer_reviews.title: Works on orange brassy Asian hair!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to believe this would work at all despite the good reviews. The first time, got my hair wet and then put this on for about 10 minutes and then rinsed. I noticed a big difference immediately. My caramel highlights that had turned orange colored was back to the caramel color (well, really close anyways). I used it the next day for 5 minutes... and then every 3rd day for the past 2 weeks. I really love this! So long going back to the salon for my repeat toner! I also found this at Marshalls for about $7 (same size). I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: laazykat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: My hair dresser suggested I used a purple toning shampoo. She had used a much more expensive product than this one on my hair.. I decided to try the Tigi. Don't waste your money. All it did was brighten my highlights. It didn't tone down the rest of my hair. Plus, the product had leaked all over the inside of the shipping box so you receive about half of what you pay for. I will buy my hairdresser's recommended product as I can actually see some results. The Tigi also dried my hair out.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Broken and leaked in shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo but when I recurved this product, there was shampoo all over the box because the lid was not fully screwed on and it was also on the other products I had ordered with it and the pump does not work at all. I’m also not able to exchange this product for some reason so I’m stuck with a broken product that wasn’t even full when I got it because it had drained in the box
customer_reviews.author: Sarena Hineser-Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Useless Lid, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I’m really torn about this product. On one hand, it costs about half as much on Amazon as it does at my local drugstore. On the other hand, the applicator lid was just completely useless. It comes with a push down top that does not push down (at least mine didn’t). Luckily I had an almost empty nearby shampoo bottle handy, and that bottle top was a good fit for this purple shampoo. The product itself is really great - my hair was significantly brightened and soft after use - but I did have to deduct a star for the fact that I had to play MacGyver in my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beth

customer_reviews.title: Did work for me
customer_reviews.text: This product had great reviews and was affordable but I did not notice any real difference in my hair. It also foams up A LOT which doesn’t really help it sit in your hair very well. Also found it to be very drying. I switched to the Fanola that a friend recommended and had better results.
customer_reviews.author: AshleeB

customer_reviews.title: Made my hairdresser think I'd stopped using purple shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in 2 years, my hairdresser asked me, "Are you using the purple shampoo??" I've been blonde that long and she's never second-guessed what I'm washing my hair with until I tried this one. I would return it if I could, I only wash my hair once per week and even with that little of use, it still stripped the good ash and left the bad brass.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Downing

customer_reviews.title: TIGI Bed Head Dumb Blonde Shampoo that really maintains your blonde color!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is a MUST HAVE for people (because guys color their hair too) it maintains your color. It's known as the Purple Shampoo and it extends the life of the blonde color in your hair. It's a must have I know I've been using it for a long time and it makes my color last much longer than if I used regular Shampoo!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine & Shawn Carr

customer_reviews.title: How to use on thin hair (a caution)...
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a normal shampoo and didn't see good results. THEN...I read the reviews and learned I can apply it to dry hair for greater results. Here's a warning: It worked--almost too well! I applied it to dry hair and waited more than an hour. At first, the results were perfect. I loved the color! But after that, my hair kept getting lighter (and less supple), even though I never used it again! So my advice is to use this gently and gradually, to monitor your results over weeks, and don't overdo it in one day--esp. on thin hair!
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Jen-Jen

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo for one, came opened, so there was some purple shampoo everywhere. The pump also didn’t work which was slightly annoying, but I sucked it up and opened it every item I washed my hair. I know they say professional products are only guaranteed when sold by a professional, so I am not sure if this was 100%, I will say, It’s not my favorite brand of purple shampoo, but I don’t hate it either. Not as good as the matrix brass off, but probably a good pick for a natural blond that’s just trying to keep the brassy out of their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Christina V

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived with the lid unscrewed and a good portion of the product all over the packaging and some of my other purchases. I haven't tried it yet but that first impression was that of a total mess and definitely not appealing. Because of the unsealed lid I've no clue whether or not substances that were NOT intended as ingredients have made their way inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It works great just condition heavily with use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for taking out the brassiness in your blonde. I used this when going from dark cherry brunette to get back to blonde. I started highlighting to work my way back to blonde and after my first set of highlights I started implementing this shampoo. It really helped progress from dark to lighter. My only complaint was that it seemed to dry my hair out more so than other purple shampoos I have used in the past. I just made sure to use a deep conditioning mask afterward. All in all it is a good purple toning shampoo and it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm so stinking impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I keep brassy, yellow hair- or I did! Not anymore! I can not compliment this product enough! It lathers well, smells good yet not too strong, the purple does NOT stain my bathroom, skin, nor is my hair tinted purple as is common with other brands. I apply this to wet hair and leave it on for about 10 minutes; usually while in the tub. Plus, of you look at prices of other high end purple shampoos this is a steal! I adore this, and will continue purchasing for the rest of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clear

customer_reviews.title: No more green!
customer_reviews.text: The left photo is “before” and the right photo is after 3 washes. Both of my photos were taken under the same (fluorescent) lighting in my office. I’m really happy with the results, especially how the greenish tones have faded out of my hair. It might be a tiny bit drying, but I just left my conditioner on for a little longer afterward and there was no harm done.
customer_reviews.author: emflei

customer_reviews.title: Not saturated enough
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting blonde highlights for over 10 years so I have tried many purple shampoos. This one has some pros (does not stain hand or shower). However, I didn't not find the purple to be saturated enough, so I am not sure if it is working as well as other purple shampoos in the past. Also when I received the product the pump did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: This actually works to get brassy tones out of your hair. I had deep brassy highlights from a lot of dye jobs and then tried to go blond. My hairdressers suggested trying a purple shampoo to brighten the blond. This definitely pulls the deep yellow brassy tones out and whiteness them to almost grey/ashy tones. I love it, although it dries out my hair and i have to use quite a bit of conditioner to combat the dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Meisner

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast. Product arrived without damage, pump was good (not broken). This does work, but keep in mind that you have to leave it in for some time. I leave it in for 8-10 minutes, then I follow it up with a purple conditioner (I use a different brand). You might not see results immediately depending on how much brass is in your hair. I just went from brunette to blonde and I immediately started using purple shampoo and conditioner. I did immediately notice brass removed but I think it is because I started using these products immediately after I went blonde.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the shampoo is for Toni
customer_reviews.text: This purple shampoo does not tone your hair. On the front of the bottle it says it is for chemically treated hair, nothing abput toning. Also, the shampoo itself is not dark purple. I think I may have been sent the wtong bottle this time. It said I had purchased this before, but the last bottle I received had a dark pure colored shampoo in it and ot worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much shipping tape wrapped around the actual shampoo bottle prior to shipping
customer_reviews.text: Beware! This product arrived with so much heavy tape on the shampoo bottle that it has destroyed the container that holds the shampoo. The shampoo bottle is a sticky, gooey mess, and it sticks to your hands when you pick it up, leaving your hands a sticky, gooey mess as well. Not sure about the product in the bottle. Due to the container being "over-taped" by the seller prior to shipping, I have no desire to use it and make a big old mess by picking it up anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the Shimmering Lights purple shampoo and decided to give this a try because I like the pump. It's seriously a million times better. It's hydrating, smells amazing, and I get a much better tone with this product. My hair leans on the orangey side in some spots and this helps neutralize those tones a lot. Right now I am using it every 3rd hair wash and I'm obsessed. 10/10 buy it now. I took this photo a couple of days ago and I haven't been to the salon in two months for reference. This shampoo has really helped keep my color fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Theeeeeeeeeee best purple shampoo I've found so far
customer_reviews.text: Theeeeeeeeeee best purple shampoo I've found so far. All of the others left my bleached hair feeling dry and brittle, almost squeaky. This toned the color perfectly and left my hair feeling soft. Didn't even have to use it every day. I wash my hair with a regular shampoo then use this purple shampoo every 3-4 days (leaving it in for about 5-7 minutes). Highly recommended. The bottle lasts me 4 months or so with my medium length hair, just at the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Pertchui Gamalyan

customer_reviews.title: No more brassy blonde!
customer_reviews.text: Ive recently hopped on board with the bayalage hair trend. In naturally a dark brunette so my blonde has the tendency to pull gold and get very brassy really quickly. This shampoo has helped me keep the cool blonde color that I started with and keep me away from the "box-blonde" look. Very pleased- as I always am with Bead Head products.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Not so great packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This product works well BUT arrived open. Accidents happen, I get that, so I took it all in stride and washed the lost product off to use what remains. Only to find that the pump was broken too. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Tones hair well, doesn't need to be used very often
customer_reviews.text: Actually does tone hair to a cooler tone! My highlights were pretty prominent in the front and were too yellow for my hair and skin tone. Used this a couple times, leaving it in about 5 min each to let it work, and my highlights are nice platinum blonde looking. Don't need to use it much (maybe once every few weeks). Wouldn't pick it for my everyday shampoo, but works well for toning.
customer_reviews.author: Jon F Giese

customer_reviews.title: THIS WILL TONE YOUR HAIR FOR REAL
customer_reviews.text: OOP. I dont usually tone my bleached hair and purple shampoos never really did much for me. I bought this on a whim and tried it randomly. Now I have an awesome array of blonde levels in my hair because I didn't touch up my new growth and rebleach the old. LOL. I should add that my hair takes bleach well and lifts great for starting at a dark brown. I definitely recommend getting blonde hair a level 9 or higher if you want this product to have actual toning results. For everything else, use a real toner first!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Needed This!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this purple shampoo is extremely hydrating compared to my last regular moisturizing shampoo. But this one tones which is really nice and if you have banana yellow hair this can fix it. I wet my hair and ringed it out then put a couple pumps in my hair and left it in for about 30 minutes (but you can do up to an hour) and BAM I’m not Highlighter yellow anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bvndrea

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product: Not Purple Toning Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter returned the first one they sent as they sent the "Shampoo for Chemically Treated Hair" noting they sent the wrong product, assuming it was just an accident and they grabbed the wrong one off the shelf. But the second shipment came with the wrong product yet again. Their Purple Toning and Chemically Treated Hair shampoos are two different products (what they set on the left vs empty bottle of what was supposed to come) . We'll be returning this one for a second time and finding somewhere else to buy the right thing as I don't have much hope that the third time will really be the charm.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Great toner shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best toning shampoo I have ever used. Unfortunately, when this arrived it was partially spilled and was all over. I was still able to get use about 3/4 of the product and it works great! I have tried about every brand of product on the market. I was skeptical when I saw this bc I have used the dumb blonde shampoo and it didn't do anything to tone my blonde hair. This really is a great shampoo to keep the brassiness at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Lawson-Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and super moisturizing and clarifying...
customer_reviews.text: Have not noticed any change in my color tone (have naturally ash blonde hair), but makes my hair bright and shiny. Smells amazing a s is a great moisturizes. I use it weekly as a clarifying hair treatment. The color does stain bathtubs and shower curtains so wear a shower cap while doing a hair treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Elizabeth Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Best Purple Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this shampoo! I've used Matrix before buying this and I ended up switching due to the high cost of Matrix and ended up loving this. Not only does it cost less, but it does a better job and doesn't stain like Matrix does. If you're on the fence about it, just go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Good not great. At least for me it hasn't done a LOT to take out the brassiness in my hair but it did do some. Could be the product but could also be my hair color. Just thought it was worth mentioning Smells amazing, cleans wonderfully, everything else is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Though it's one of the better purple shampoos I hAve used after once weekly use ...
customer_reviews.text: Brightened my hair at first, but now just dries it out... I am on the fence on this! Though it's one of the better purple shampoos I hAve used after once weekly use over a month or so, it has begun to really dry out my hair and not doing much with brightening my hair ... I'm not sure if my hair is just dry for another reason, but this is the only thing in my regimen that I have changed
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: Brings out the Brassiness in your Hair
customer_reviews.text: This product did not help to remove brassy or bronze tones that has creeped in over time in between appointments. I actually felt that this product was making my hair even brassier than what I started with. I quickly purchased another purple shampoo and immediately noticed a difference. I have not used this product since. In the photo, you can see the brassy section at the roots of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand all of the hype this shampoo didn’t help tone my hair at all. It smells amazing but that’s it. I have brown to blonde ombré and sometimes it gets brassy and this didn’t help. Shimmer lights worked better even the Walmart brand worked way better.
customer_reviews.author: marissa ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: This product lacks the pigment needed to reduce brass in color treated blonde hair. The product is more like a traditional shampoo made for washing and doesn’t seem to penetrate hair enough to distribute the color particles. Go for the Fanola brand instead. Don’t waste your time with this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: ValerieTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Brass Banisher
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it truly does give your hair a nice brass away lift. It leaves it dry and that’s because I never shampoo but I LOVE how I put it in & no matter how long it doesn’t leave a purple tint like an elixir I use by another brand I really love. This is a great refresh for us blondies and my hair is almost white.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this shampoo yet, but wanted to say when the bottle arrived the lid was untwisted and some had spilled out. It wasn’t much but still i paid money for a full bottles worth. Please make sure lids are screwed on properly! Other than that I’m happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lashele.maynard

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo really does keep your blonde hair toned, especially if you have hard water and your hair tends to go brassy. You have to wash it out thoroughly so you don’t have any purple residue left in your roots. Also, be careful to wash it all down the drain, it can stain the shower. I did not give 5 stars across the board because it does dry out your hair if you don’t follow up with a good deep conditioner. But for the price, it is a great shampoo for keeping your blonde hair looking toned.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a purple mess. The pump dispenser was broken and the product leaked. Fortunately, there was enough plastic surrounding the bottle that the shampoo did not escape the outer package. I must completely unscrew the pump from the bottle to access the product. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Okay purple shampoo, nothing too great
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is okay. It didnt really work unless my hair was dry, which meant I had to use a lot more to cover. I'm asian so I have a lot of hair and when bleaching, my hair is very stubborn. I added it to an already purple elixir treatment I had and it works better. I probably wouldn't buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: Pandabunnytail

customer_reviews.title: Good with brassy. Bad with cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo for the past few weeks and so far has worked very well with keeping my blonde hair from getting too brassy. The down side is that I feel it does not do well with cleaning my scalp and it can be a little drying. I try to use it every other wash or every 3 washes. The sent of this shampoo is amazing. I love how my hair smells after.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!! BUY IT!! IT WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m naturally a dark brunette (with greys) and dyed my hair an ashy blonde to blend the grey better. After a few weeks, the toner definitely went away and it started getting brassy. My hair stylist gave me a purple shampoo and I didn’t see much difference. I purchased this one and wow!! You can see a difference in just one use but after 3 it was basically back to the color it was when I left the salon!! Definitely worth every penny and then some! It saved me a trip having to get my hair retoned or redying it! People at work even asked if I’ve had it redone! LOVE IT! BUY IT! IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if maybe I just got a bad batch of this, but I used this a couple of times and left it on for about 2-3 minutes tops and it caused my hair to become extremely brassy, I didn't realize what was causing my hair to turn until I noticed I swapped from another "purple shampoo" to this one and saw a couple of other reviews. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Smells Nice, Nozzle Didn't Work, Thick
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo itself is fine - very thick and gloppy, so you don't need a lot. The pump doesn't work which has made it a huge hassle to use, though, because pouring a thick shampoo out is troublesome, not to mention what a vibrant purple it is...it just looks like a mess and have to clean up after it every time. Smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great product but received leaking and broken bottle
customer_reviews.text: Staple in my blonde care but I was disappointed to see the bottle had leaked all over and the pump does not work. I salvaged 3/4 of the bottle and put it into a new pump bottle. Wish the packaging had been better and I didn’t lose shampoo :(
customer_reviews.author: sleigh716

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I have yet to dye my hair blonde yet, but I decided to use this product to remove the brassy tones out of my brown hair first. I would have to say I have definitely noticed some minor changes in the tone of my hair. I am excited to see what kind of effect it has once I bleach. It’s a slow process but I am sure it will be worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Strack

customer_reviews.title: Skip salon toners just buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I used this after bleaching my hair and left it in for a few minutes. It took most of the yellow tones out of my hair (I hadn’t used any toner on my bleached hair). This smells so much better than salon toners and is much gentler than a regular shampoo. Definitely got the job done and my hair feels amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Not the right product!!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I bought this, it was great! The shampoo was a dark, dark purple. Worked wonderfully to tone my hair color. The second time I ordered it, I went to use it, and the shampoo was almost white with a tint of purple. I looked at the bottle label closer, and it says "Dumb Blonde" but only says "For chemically treated hair" NOT "purple toning shampoo". They sent me the wrong bottle. Bummer because I didn't have to use it for a while and it is now past the window to return it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wright

customer_reviews.title: would love to use this product
customer_reviews.text: Both bottles were leaking when they were delivered and neither one of the pumps will open so I can't leave a review and how the product actually works I will update this review lunts somebody corrects these 2 problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Wylde

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! My blind hair gets brassy pretty quick. I gave it a shot and it's done to much better than another toning shampoos I've got. I left mine on for 6 minutes and its super ashy and beige toned now. It smells really nice, a lot like pineville and vanilla to me.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo, exploded in box though
customer_reviews.text: While I'm very happy with the shampoo as far as the scent and how it washes my hair, I had the same issue many others have had. The shampoo had exploded in the box and there was quite a mess inside when I opened it. the lid was still intact so I'm not sure why this is happening but beware. Whatever the issue has been it's not taken care of yet.
customer_reviews.author: R MAC

customer_reviews.title: Keeping summer going and going
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like those product. It has a wonderful scent. It takes a couple shampoos too get the blonde back to the fun summer color I had. I will defiantly buy this again. The only problem I had was with three shipping.and that's not their fault. I ordered a lot is stuff from Amazon and they put a bunch of stuff in 1 box. The shampoo leaked a little in the bag but it was a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: billie jo Harris

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for the brassy color in my highlights. I'd say spend the extra money for a product that works. This did smell good. Left my hair nice and clean. So, it won't go to waste. I just wouldn't buy it to tone.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Great toner
customer_reviews.text: I very much enjoy this toner and the only reason I gave it 4 stars is because this is the second time getting it where it’s leaving due to a loose cap. It’s a great price for the product compared to Ultas cost, I just wish the cap was tightened before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Heather and Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great toner. Leaves hair very dry. Must use a good conditioner after
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for removing the brassy blond. It gives you a more silver platinum blonde. It is a very dry product. Use a thick conditioner or hair mask after you use the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Great and effective purple shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is great! It smells wonderful and doesn't dry out your hair. It takes about 3 washes to see major results but your hair will be noticeably brighter after the first wash. I usually leave it in my hair for about 2-3 min before rinsing. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking to brighten their blonde locks.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Teeter

customer_reviews.title: Product was abrasive to hair
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged/spilled from the original packaging already. That perhaps signal something was not going to be right. Upon using the product, it was not as advertised (might be due to the damage?). Attempted to contact customer service for a resolution but was unsuccessful. The product didn’t adhere to hair properly and was rather abrasive? Probably I got a bad bottle but still, please be careful when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Luong

customer_reviews.title: Stopped using
customer_reviews.text: This product was super hit or miss; it'd either do absolutely nothing to my hair or turn it purple if I left it on for a second too long. The purple bed head products weren't my favorite and I've since switched. My hair was simply very dry and damaged while I was using this.
customer_reviews.author: Jslowinski

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of the brass look
customer_reviews.text: Used this once, I did my own hair a month ago and it was screaming brass. Used this once- left it in approximately 4 minutes and it worked!! I am hoping for more improvement on the next wash.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Jax

customer_reviews.title: Weighs down my hair
customer_reviews.text: Well it smells good and does the job of making my hair not brassy looking but..it weighs down my hair! I don't like how it feels after my hair is dry. Feels like I can't rinse it all out. So I really don't like it because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed correctly may not be real deal
customer_reviews.text: Product was not sealed and has leaked out of bottle. This isn’t good because at anytime it could have been tampered with and I’m now not okay with the idea of using it
customer_reviews.author: Gocke

customer_reviews.title: Very subtle effect on dark hair w/ highlights, prob works best on gray or blonde hair
customer_reviews.text: Received in no time, wrapped very thoroughly too. It doesn't lather at all, but I mainly bought it for the color correction. I think it does work, but I have dark hair and blonde highlights, so its hard to see a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: REalHousewife

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for quite some time. Always from salon. Then came Shelter In Place! Found it on Amazon. I have used other Silver shampoos but like this best.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite purple shampoo so far!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this brand of purple shampoo and I was really happy with it! I have blonde highlights with a cinnamon base color and it got rid of the brassiness that pops up after a few weeks out of salon. It smelled great and left my hair soft too 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I went blonde to let my hair go gray naturally and this product made me love my hair again. The process to get my hair to blonde left my hair yellow and brassy - this product corrected it (my first application was to dry hair - for about 20 minutes). My hair is not brassy and bright yellow anymore. This is my second bottle - I use it almost every day just to wash because my hair actually feels nice after using too. I also use with the dumb blonde conditioner. This shampoo is less expensive here than at other stores and it was shipped to me perfectly wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for me to use by my cosmetologist sister
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in packing peanuts with some purple shampoo leaked throughout. Not enough for me to complain, but maybe there's some way to ship with a regular closed top and the pump as a separate piece? I don't see a difference with this shampoo. Recommended for me to use by my cosmetologist sister.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t gotten to try it yet but unfortunately the lid was not screwed on and lost a lot of product. It was delivered in a package that had clothes in it but luckily those were properly sealed because the shampoo leaked everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: H. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Opened the box to a mess...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and all, would be 5 stars if they made the box big enough for the shampoo so it didn’t explode everywhere... kinda sucks to open the shampoo and see you’ve already lost a good amount of it
customer_reviews.author: TonyaM1973

customer_reviews.title: Best purple shampoo ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I was looking for a shampoo that makes my blonde hair not brassy looking and this shampoo does the work! After 4 washes it has done more than any other purple shampoo has ever done. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect much being that it’s been a year since my last high lights. But in one use it whitened up my old blonde. Boyfriend thought I’d dyed it when he got home. I recommend putting on only damp hair since it worked best where the product color was concentrated. I’ll never buy another purple shampoo, this is the first one I’ve seen make a difference. Amazing smell also!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was opened when received.
customer_reviews.text: This was purple shampoo for my hair. When I took it out of the box the plastic bag was purple and the the bottle was open. When trying to get the plunger to work it broke and now I can not use the plunger to get the shampoo. Very disappointed with purple shampoo all over the bottle and plastic bag. And now can not dispense shampoo because the broken dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Grams

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Made my hair blonder. I love the results. The only thing is it does dry my hair out. Makes it tangle more. I put it on my hair while it’s dry and leave it for a couple minutes then wash it out.
customer_reviews.author: KMC

customer_reviews.title: Worked to tone my yellow bleached hair without toning with wella
customer_reviews.text: My hair was very yellow and brassy but blonde. Used this , I usually use shimmer lights. Worked great for the price . Hair was a little purple in spots because my hair is porous in spots from over processing. I applied onto dry hair for maximum tone especially in my roots that were most brassy. Use every few days to upkeep white blonde. I feel like it's not as drying as shimmer lights which was nice. Here's a before and after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much pigment
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a a fan of TIGI products and unfortunately this didn’t live up to the standard. I felt it left my hair dried out even after using a conditioner. I will continue to use this once it’s gone but I don’t think I will purchase it again. The purple isn’t very pigmented.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and worked good
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in awesome condition. Took me awhile to figure out how to use this properly. Once I got the hang of it, it was pretty easy. Made my hair look really pretty after I used it. Made my hair look like a cool and smokey grey/silver tone.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn M.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I am furious! This bottle came to me defective! The cap wouldn't twist open, it was as if the components has melted together or something. I had to completely take it apart and put the contents into a new bottle.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: i used this once and i think it did help with the brasiness. i’m hoping after it using it more it will make it even more ashy. i used it on dry hair. however, i was upset to receive my package with it spilled in the bag. i also couldn’t figure out how to pull up the pump. i think these are issues that many other people had as well
customer_reviews.author: Caitie Willett

customer_reviews.title: My product arrived taped at the top, NOT sealed ...
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived taped at the top, NOT sealed. I gave it a try..a FEW times to be fair, and I have a feeling this is knock off. It dried my hair out which the real bed head would not do, and did not tone my platinum hair at all. Absolutely NO difference. After reading the other reviews and their experience with this product I am almost positive it’s a knock off. Wouldn’t it come sealed if it was new?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: shipping problems
customer_reviews.text: I do love this shampoo. have been using a number of weeks and love my hair. my problem was when the items were received. 2 out of the 3 bottles sent were not closed completely and the shampoo leaked out. thank goodness each was individually sealed in bags. it was already a mess but could have been worse.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Not the real shampoo. Seems to be fake or bad new formula
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product several times in the past and it was always the deep dark purple that would take the brassiness out. I just started to use this. I'm not impressed. This bottle has very light purple shampoo and seems to be fake. The consistency and fragrance are different too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S M

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo to brighten blonde hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping that it would take the brass tones out of my hair and it did exactly that. Ever since I started using this, I've gotten a lot of compliments. I love this shampoo. Not only works great but smells great also!
customer_reviews.author: T.K. Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works perfectly for what I need. I only use once a week and it does what I need it to do. Smells good. Hair feels good afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Barten

customer_reviews.title: Product leaked and poured out in the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this product a fare review. I got the package in the mail today and it had exploded In The packaging. I had the biggest mess I’ve ever seen. I threw it all away and spent a few hours cleaning the floors. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Jbelle

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN PUMP & SPILLED
customer_reviews.text: The item seems ok. It is only getting 2 stars because the pump was broken and the shampoo leaked in the bag. 😠 Trying to ship it back would be a bit more of an ordeal I wanted to deal with today. Kept the shampoo because I happen to have a lotion pump that worked with it.
customer_reviews.author: Msgiggly2

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I leave the conditioner in my hair for about 7ish minutes and it works very well to lighten up my hair back to the shade I want it at. I am able to go longer between hair appointments which is awesome and saves me money! Also smells great too
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: does not dry out hair like other purple shampoos
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this actually makes my hair softer. Def recommend and will be re-purchasing. Other stuff (specifically the shimmer lights) can dry out your hair, but this is good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Pittsy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened,  pump does not work
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, will try another brand next time. Biggest issue was the bottle arrived open , with a little bit leaking out, and the pump does not work
customer_reviews.author: Nonotuck

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, packaging not so much.
customer_reviews.text: product is great, used it in the past, but the packaging is what i'm rating it for. the shampoo was everywhere in the packaging, the box it came in was way too small for the item and a makeup storage container i purchased with it. The box caused the shampoo to be crushed and the top pump to be broken, with shampoo covering the plastic bag it was in.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Used for over a month, no real difference, made my hair extremely dry, rough, and brittle
customer_reviews.text: Did not notice much of a difference, if any, after using this product for over a month, about everyday or every other day. This product has actually made my hair very rough, dry, and brittle! Not a fan. Do not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Parke

customer_reviews.title: Get a good conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It works. I kept mine in too long, and it turned it dark grey. But it's kinda better now. It does work but dont use it for too long or every day
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Missing a lot of the product in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Package came in and the product was all over. Almost looks like they didn't make sure the lid was tight enough before shipping it out.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy W

customer_reviews.title: Good and healthy hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair felt healthy after using which is hard to accomplish with purple shampoo and it took out most of the yellow and when I added color it came out pretty vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: I guess it is working.
customer_reviews.text: this does not suds up at all. i have to mix it with my shampoo but maybe it is working...it is very rich in color and my hair isn't brassy but i recently bought a toner as well so that could have done it. i'd say give it a shot. It is more for keeping hair not brassy as opposed to correcting color, i'd say b ut i'm not hair stylist.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great product's and good prices
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product. I have no idea why I didn't know about this before. It smells great and my hair is so soft and manageable. The big thing is my blond highlights look like I just got them done!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo for blonde hair. Not a purple shampoo but does help keep dullness away. Smells great, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Gentle shampoo without sulfate and pleasant fruity smell. I use this to extend my blue hair dye. You nee to leave it on for 1 to 10 minutes to soak in. Cleans my hair pretty well and foams up better than other non sulfate shampoos. Would buy again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra tu

product_meta.title: TIGI Bed Head Dumb Blonde Purple Toning Shampoo, 13.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: A tone correcting shampoo for blonde hair. Helps gently cleanse blondes while refreshing and conditioning hair. Contains purple toning pigment to neutralize brassy tones in blondes and enhance cool tones. Blended with Polyquaternium 10 to prevent and control frizz, static and flyaway. Improves blonde vibrancy and imparts shine. Leaves hair soft, smooth and manageable. Great for chemically treated hair
feature_bullets: Helps gently cleanse blondes while refreshing and conditioning hair.To be used once a week and the product is colour safe
Contains purple toning pigment to neutralize brassy tones in blondes and enhance cool tones
Blended with Polyquaternium 10 to prevent and control frizz, static and flyaway

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
